00007 // fixed-point arithmetic definitions start here
00008 
00009 typedef INT32 FIXEDPT;
00010 // rem 1 signed bit at the top
00011 #define FIXEDPT_WHOLE_BITS 11
00012 #define FIXEDPT_FRACTIONAL_BITS 20
00013 #define FIXEDPT_FRACTIONAL_RESOLUTION 1048576
00014 
00015 #define INT32_TO_FIXEDPT( n ) ( (n) << FIXEDPT_FRACTIONAL_BITS )
00016 #define FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( n ) ( (n) / FIXEDPT_FRACTIONAL_RESOLUTION )
00017 
00018 #define FIXEDPT_TO_TILE_NUM( n ) (FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( (n) ) / CELL_X_SIZE)
00019 #define FIXEDPT_TO_LOS_INDEX( n ) (CONVERT_WITHINTILE_TO_INDEX( FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( (n) ) % CELL_X_SIZE))
00020 
00021 // fixed-point arithmetic definitions end here

00075 #define HEIGHT_UNITS 256
00076 #define HEIGHT_UNITS_PER_INDEX (HEIGHT_UNITS / PROFILE_Z_SIZE)
00077 #define MAX_STRUCTURE_HEIGHT 50
00078 // 5.12 == HEIGHT_UNITS / MAX_STRUCTURE_HEIGHT
00079 #define CONVERT_PIXELS_TO_HEIGHTUNITS( n ) ((n) * HEIGHT_UNITS / MAX_STRUCTURE_HEIGHT)
00080 #define CONVERT_PIXELS_TO_INDEX( n ) ((n) * HEIGHT_UNITS / MAX_STRUCTURE_HEIGHT / HEIGHT_UNITS_PER_INDEX)
00081 #define CONVERT_HEIGHTUNITS_TO_INDEX( n ) ((n) / HEIGHT_UNITS_PER_INDEX)
00082 #define CONVERT_HEIGHTUNITS_TO_DISTANCE( n ) ((n) / (HEIGHT_UNITS / CELL_X_SIZE) )
00083 #define CONVERT_HEIGHTUNITS_TO_PIXELS( n ) ((n) * MAX_STRUCTURE_HEIGHT / HEIGHT_UNITS )
00084 #define CONVERT_WITHINTILE_TO_INDEX( n ) ((n) >> 1)
00085 #define CONVERT_INDEX_TO_WITHINTILE( n ) ((n) << 1)
00086 #define CONVERT_INDEX_TO_PIXELS( n ) ((n) * MAX_STRUCTURE_HEIGHT * HEIGHT_UNITS_PER_INDEX / HEIGHT_UNITS)
